mapper.select: SELECT r.id as id, r.role_name as roleName, r.role_name_zh as roleNameZh, r.role_description as roleDescription, r.status as status, r.applicable_unit_level as applicableUnitLevel, r.product_code as productCode, r.created_time as createdTime FROM as_user_role ur,as_role r where ur.role_id=r.id AND ur.uid=#{id}

update as_user
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

user_remark = #{userRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
